src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /

src_original: yadā me subhūte kaliṃgarājā aṃgapratyaṃgāny acchetsīn nāsīn me tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā satvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā na me kācit saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā babhūva /

src_original: naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti /  api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti anekabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti /  ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣv ekacittaprasādamātram api pratilapsyaṃte /
tgt_original: 「已於無量千萬諸佛所修行，供養無量百千萬諸佛所種諸善根，聞是修多羅，乃至一念能生淨信。

src_original: subhūtir āha /
tgt_original: 」須菩提言：

src_original: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata /
tgt_original: 「甚多，婆伽婆！ 甚多，修伽陀！

src_original: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
tgt_original: 彼善男子、善女人，得福甚多。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: sa eva bhagavann askandhaḥ /  tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate puṇyaskandhaḥ askandha iti bhagavān āha /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 是福德聚，即非福德聚，是故如來說福德聚。

src_original: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ tṛsāhasrāmahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「須菩提！ 若善男子、善女人，以滿三千大千世界七寶，持用布施。

src_original: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyad aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayed ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt
tgt_original: 若復於此經中，受持乃至四句偈等，為他人說，其福勝彼，無量不可數。

src_original: bhagavān āha /
tgt_original: 」佛言：

src_original: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāminaḥ evaṃ bhaven mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
tgt_original: 「須菩提！ 於意云何？ 斯陀含能作是念『我得斯陀含果』不？

src_original: subhūtir āha /
tgt_original: 」須菩提言：

src_original: no hīdaṃ bhagavan /  bhagavān āha /  tat kasya hetoḥ /  na sakṛdāgāmino evaṃ bhavati mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
tgt_original: 「不也。 世尊！

src_original: subhūtir āha /
tgt_original: 」須菩提言：

src_original: tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: na hi sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvam āpannaḥ /  tenocyate sakṛdāgāmīti /
